Html:
Hi,

Any one know how to import animations like particle effects into Goblin XNA ??? I tried with joint animations. It worked very well. But i need to import particle effects from maya into G-XNA. Any help ????

hi,

you must export models as FBX... take a look at this http://graphics.cs.columbia.edu/wiki/doku.php?id=wiki:user:henderso:tutorials:fbxtoxna
